医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型假肢将大脑信号实时转换为语音由杜克大学神经科学家、神经外科医生和工程师组成的合作团队开发的言语假肢可以将人的大脑信号转化为他们想要说的话。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-prosthetic-converts-brain-signals-to-speech-in-real-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-prosthetic-converts-brain-signals-to-speech-in-real-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff738836-e0de-40b7-bbfb-5714cc9d1114 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 23:48:00 -0500 New prosthetic converts brain signals to speech in real time
新量表有效衡量儿童和成人与流行病相关的压力流行病相关创伤压力量表 (PTSS) 可用于有效测量与 COVID-19 大流行相关的压力，并识别压力水平较高、可能需要额外心理健康支持的儿童和成人。美国国立卫生研究院的环境对儿童健康成果计划 (ECHO) 的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-scale- effectively-measures-pandemic-lated-stress-in-children-and-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-scale- effectively-measures-pandemic-lated-stress-in-children-and-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d6420f5-cf6a-42cc-8923-cee49ea41442 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 22:39:12 -0500 New scale effectively measures pandemic-related stress in children and adults
血液检测可提前两年预测多发性硬化症残疾恶化根据加州大学旧金山分校研究人员牵头的一项新研究，多发性硬化症患者的血液检查显示 NfL（一种神经损伤的生物标志物）升高，一到两年后可能会出现残疾恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Blood-test-predicts-MS-disability-worsening-up-to-two-years-in-advance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Blood-test-predicts-MS-disability-worsening-up-to-two-years-in-advance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87021bd8-aed7-4918-9166-a123cb387387 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 22:29:07 -0500 Blood test predicts MS disability worsening up to two years in advance
新的病理评分系统可以帮助预测肺癌患者的生存约翰霍普金斯大学金梅尔癌症中心彭博~金梅尔癌症免疫治疗研究所的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，一种新的病理评分系统可以准确评估患者接受术前癌症治疗后留下的肺部肿瘤数量，可用于预测生存率约翰·霍普金斯大学高级基因组学和成像中心和马克基金会中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-pathologic-scoring-system-could-help-predict-survival-in-lung-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-pathologic-scoring-system-could-help-predict-survival-in-lung-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5902e843-0e06-4f25-844d-96a1f0a90bd5 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 22:22:40 -0500 New pathologic scoring system could help predict survival in lung cancer patients
针对 COVID-19 的新型鼻疫苗在动物研究中显示出希望马里兰大学研究人员团队开发了一种鼻喷雾疫苗，可将 SARS-CoV-2 刺突蛋白输送到小鼠和仓鼠的气道细胞中，引发免疫反应，从而显着减少 COVID-19 的感染和传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-nasal-vaccine-for-COVID-19-shows-promise-in-animal-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-nasal-vaccine-for-COVID-19-shows-promise-in-animal-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50dd7010-3658-4206-8e49-8041ce409db4 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 22:15:16 -0500 New nasal vaccine for COVID-19 shows promise in animal studies
印度尼西亚沃尔巴克氏菌试验的新分析显示了更大程度减少登革热的潜力对抗登革热的斗争有了新武器：感染沃尔巴克氏菌的蚊子，这种细菌可以防止病毒传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-analysis-of-Indonesia-Wolbachia-trial-shows-potential-for-greater-dengue-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/New-analysis-of-Indonesia-Wolbachia-trial-shows-potential-for-greater-dengue-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56948c2f-73c9-464a-ba7b-93e0c2a06496 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 22:09:19 -0500 New analysis of Indonesia Wolbachia trial shows potential for greater dengue reduction
UTHSC 治疗晚期前列腺癌的候选药物进入首次临床试验田纳西大学健康科学中心的研究人员开发的一种治疗晚期转移性去势抵抗性前列腺癌的候选药物目前正在进行首次临床试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/UTHSCs-drug-candidate-for-advanced-prostate-cancer-goes-to-first-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/UTHSCs-drug-candidate-for-advanced-prostate-cancer-goes-to-first-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e5c9210-97f5-4663-9612-9dd2ada34243 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 21:59:21 -0500 UTHSC's drug candidate for advanced prostate cancer goes to first clinical trial
揭示 HER2 突变等位基因在乳腺癌中的作用2023 年 10 月 31 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“HER2 突变等位基因在乳腺癌中的未知作用”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Unraveling-the-role-of-HER2-mutant-aleles-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Unraveling-the-role-of-HER2-mutant-alleles-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05d5aea4-9d1c-49f7-a901-f0fce397de84 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 21:54:44 -0500 Unraveling the role of HER2 mutant alleles in breast cancer
三项新研究表明低剂量阿托品有助于减缓儿童近视美国儿童的近视率达到历史最高水平。预计到 2050 年，全球将有一半人口近视。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Three-new-studies-show-low-dose-atropine-can-help-slow-myopia-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Three-new-studies-show-low-dose-atropine-can-help-slow-myopia-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5b4161a-edef-4dd8-a42b-8ec8578403f5 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 21:45:15 -0500 Three new studies show low-dose atropine can help slow myopia in children
研究表明，儿童需要像患有镰状细胞病的成年人一样经常进行视力问题筛查镰状细胞病是一种罕见的遗传性疾病，其中红细胞变得坚硬、粘稠并改变形状，类似于农具。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Children-need-to-be-screened-for-vision-problems-as-often-as-adults-with-sickle-cell-disease-study-建议.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231106/Children-need-to-be-screened-for-vision-problems-as-often-as-adults-with-sickle-cell-disease-study- suggest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e00ee69d-5bc2-43d0-a74a-b93e85daec64 Mon, 06 Nov 2023 21:39:56 -0500 Children need to be screened for vision problems as often as adults with sickle cell disease, study suggests
